    EmCare.B14S2.DE44Skin ProblemThe health care worker would like to add a skin problem

    EmCare.B14S2.DE46Eye ProblemThe health care worker would like to add an Eye problem
    EmCare.B14S2.DE47No - Do not add a Skin or Mouth or Eye ProblemThe healthcare worker would not like to add a Skin or Mouth or Eye Problem
